Amaury Feitosa Tomaz Airport (IATA: ERN: 31 January 1978: a TABA – Transportes Aéreos da Bacia Amazônica Embraer EMB 110 Bandeirante registration PT-GKW crashed upon take-off from Eirunepé. The crew of 2 died but all 14 passengers survived.
The airport is located 4 km (2 mi) from downtown Eirunepé.
